subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Led by Carmelo Anthony, who seemed to enjoy silencing Celtic fans, the Knicks routed the Celtics and took a three-games-to-none lead in their first-round series.
snippet: Led by Carmelo Anthony, who seemed to enjoy silencing Celtic fans, the Knicks routed the Celtics and took a three-games-to-none lead in their first-round series.
